SKT_FIRST.name: Trigger Happy
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the ally with the highest Attack by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、攻撃力が最も高い味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>UPさせる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 공격력이 가장 높은 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并使攻击力最高的友军<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升\n<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases the Priority of all allies\nIncreases Priority by 10%
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 味方全体に行動ゲージUP\n行動ゲージ+10%
SKT_BURST_1.effect_kr: 아군 전체의 행동 게이지 증가\n행동 게이지 +10%
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 全体友军行动值提升\n行动值+10%

SKT_SECOND.name: Lucky or Die
SKT_SECOND.name_jp: ラッキー・オア・ダイ
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Increases all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Critical Damage</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. Gains an <color=#28d9ed>extra turn</color> after using this skill.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>会心率</color>と<color=#28d9ed>会心ダメージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。スキル使用後、<color=#28d9ed>追加ターン</color>を獲得する。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>치명 확률</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>치명 피해</color>를 증가시킵니다. 스킬 사용 후 <color=#28d9ed>추가 턴</color>을 획득합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 使全体友军的<color=#28d9ed>暴击率</color>和<color=#28d9ed>暴击伤害</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。使用技能后,获得<color=#28d9ed>额外回合</color>。

4_zh: 暴击伤害量持续时间+1回合

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: My Bloody Valentine
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: マイ・ブラッディ・バレンタイン
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and reduces the target's Priority by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。対象の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>-15%</color>DOWNさせる。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. 대상의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>-15%</color> 감소시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,使敌人的行动值降低<color=#28d9ed>-15%</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase Critical Damage of all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the ally with the highest Attack by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で味方全体の会心ダメージが<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPする。\n\n<color=#fff95f>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、攻撃力が最も高い味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 치명 피해량이 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 공격력이 가장 높은 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携收尾效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率使全体友军的暴击伤害量提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,使攻击力最高友军的<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
